init.title: Update Tomorrow.io Options
init.description:
If your API key allows for a different number of requests per day from the default, you can set the limit here. Note that all `tomorrowio` config entries using this API key will be updated so that your limit is not exceeded.

If you choose to enable the `nowcast` forecast entity, you can configure the number of minutes between each forecast. The number of forecasts provided depends on the number of minutes chosen between forecasts.
